channel.title: Another Couple of Compiler Errors

item.title: Another Couple of Compiler Errors
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[code] public static java.util.Calendar cal = java.util.Calendar.getInstance(); public static String time() { java.text.SimpleDateFormat timestamp = new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm:ss"); cal.setTimeInMillis(System.currentTimeMillis()); return "[" + timestamp.format(cal.getTime()) + "] "; } [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Another Couple of Compiler Errors
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

public String date = new SimpleDateFormat(“MM/dd/yyyy”).format(new Date());
public String time = new SimpleDateFormat(“hh:mm:ss”).format(new Date());

You might wanna declare those Strings =).

item.title: Another Couple of Compiler Errors
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

While compileing, i get these three errors

client.java:30: cannot find symbol
symbol  : class SimpleDateFormat
location: class client
    SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm");
    ^
client.java:30: cannot find symbol
symbol  : class SimpleDateFormat
location: class client
    SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm");
                               ^
client.java:31: cannot find symbol
symbol  : class Date
location: class client
    String date = sdf.format(new Date());
                                 ^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

heres the code part of it that the errors are at

[code]
public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

public int zdpoints = 0;
public int zbpoints = 0;

public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@red@Zombies Killed:" +zdpoints, 6570);
sendFrame126("@whi@Players Online: " + players, 6572);
SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat(“MMM dd hh:mm”);
String date = sdf.format(new Date());
sendFrame126("@cya@" + date, 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
}
[/code] How can i fix this?

Read full topic
